attributes.action: become honest, trustworthy and disband from the new world order.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have started this petition to see how trustworthy the goverment really is. this petition is to get past the lies and reveal the truth behind the goverment. Please sign this petition to help the show how corrupt goverment really is. we the people should demand the truth rather than be spoonfed lies that the goverment has made to cover the truth and use fear tactics to controll us. sign this petition and help free your self from this crooked satanic world that the goverment use against you in everyway to brainwash you.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
